1.title: Kat
1.plot: Kat realizes her life is completely falling apart. The rent is past due. Her parents just financially cut her off via voicemail. And she's painfully single. Plus, her situation at work is about to get very complicated-not because Kat has no idea what the company actually does or because she's an actual cat- but because the boss has a big life-changing announcement.

2.title: Mansplainations
2.plot: In a fight to keep her job, it's time for Kat to speak up. But Kat can't get a word in, because the guys in the office all want to talk for her. And Kat is an actual cat.

3.title: Self Discovery
3.plot: It's day one of Kat's 7-day journey to fix for her life. In an effort to know herself, she wants to really truly know her friends... starting with the question, "Why are they letting cat drive?"

4.title: Health
4.plot: On day two of her 7-day journey to fix her life, Kat focuses on health. It's time to check-in with her doctor, build a work-out routine, and really figure out a path to wellness. (If she can first figure out: A. what health insurance is, and B. if she has it.) With a step counter on her paw, Kat forges a new path!

5.title: Work
5.plot: Three days into her 7-day plan to fix her life, Kat focuses on turning her job into a career. Kat realizes that promotions take more work than just updating your title on your social media profile. Her job is already in jeopardy, and this might be her last day. Losing a job is devastating for anyone, but it's even worse when you're a cat with no prospects... and Kat is an actual cat.

6.title: Friends
6.plot: Kat loves her best friends, Andrea and Kelsie, but do they know she loves them? On Day four of her 7-Day plan to fix her life Kat is focusing on friendship (and making sure that she doesn't die alone in a roomful of old ladies). She plans an epic "bestie festie," but can Kat-an actual cat-stay focused enough to pull it off?

7.title: Love
7.plot: On day five of her 7-day journey to fix her life it gets a little awkward. Kelsie tries to kickstart Kat's love life via online dating. A surprise visit from Kat's crush, Matthew, sends her into a relationship tailspin. Relationships are tough, and being an actual cat in the world of humans makes them even harder.

8.title: Faith
8.plot: Kat faces her biggest question yet-faith. Is there a God? What happens after we die? Is there more to life than napping and litterboxes? On day six of her 7-day journey, Kat decides she needs to figure out her beliefs. It's a huge moral question for any human, but since Kat is an actual cat, it's an even bigger deal.

9.title: Family
9.plot: On the final day of her 7-day journey to fix her life, Kat focuses on family and heads home for the holidays. As expected, nothing goes according to plan and big news from friends and family makes Kat question every choice she's ever made. It's important to note, that Kat is an actual cat, a feline.

10.title: The End
10.plot: With her job on the line, Kat needs to make the presentation of her life. It is the end of her 7-day quick fix journey, and Kat decides to put it all out there. And by the way, Kat is an actual cat.

imdb.plot outline: Shortly after turning 24, Kat realizes that her entire life is a mess. She can't afford rent. Her friendships are falling apart. She's single, uninsured, and completely lost. When Kat's parents cut her off financially, she realizes it's time to start adulting. Looking for a quick fix, she takes on a 7 Day Challenge to fix her entire life. And Kat is, um, a house cat.
